files.name: hover-card-content.svelte
files.content:
<script>import { LinkPreview as HoverCardPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
import { cn } from "$lib/utils.js";
let {
  ref = $bindable(null),
  class: className,
  align = "center",
  sideOffset = 4,
  ...restProps
} = $props();
</script>

<HoverCardPrimitive.Content
	bind:ref
	{align}
	{sideOffset}
	class={cn(
		"bg-popover text-popover-foreground z-50 mt-3 w-64 rounded-md border p-4 shadow-md outline-none",
		className
	)}
	{...restProps}
/>

files.name: index.js
